properties.description: Add a Union ALL to pickup unknown record

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
Date_OF_Birth as create_date, 
[User_Name] as [user_id], 
[First_Name] as first_name, 
[LastName] as last_name, 
[First_Name] + ',' + [LastName] as FullName, 
[User_Name] as login_id, 
[EMail] as email, 
1 as active, 
getdate() as update_date, 
1 as billable, 
0 as mscrm_system_user_id, 
0 as mscrm_cat_consultant_id, 
0 as mscrm_contact_id, 
165 as contractor_rate, 
1 as contractor_rate_type, 
1234 as user_guid, 
Weight_in_Kgs as bamboo_id, 
'Data' as practice, 
1 as current_manager, 
'0' as xCustom,
3 as joblevel_rate, 
Phone_No as mobile_phone
from dbo.dboEmpSample

sources.name: sUserData
sources.description: This is the description sections.  This is a parquet data source.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		active as integer,
		update_date as timestamp,
		billable as integer,
		mscrm_system_user_id as integer,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id as integer,
		mscrm_contact_id as integer,
		contractor_rate as integer,
		contractor_rate_type as integer,
		user_guid as integer,
		bamboo_id as double,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		xCustom as string,
		joblevel_rate as integer,
		mobile_phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sUserData
sUserData select(mapColumn(
		create_date,
		user_id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		active,
		update_date,
		billable,
		mscrm_system_user_id,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id,
		mscrm_contact_id,
		contractor_rate,
		contractor_rate_type,
		user_guid,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		xCustom,
		mobile_phone,
		joblevel_rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectUserData
SelectUserData aggregate(groupBy(billable,
		active,
		user_id),
	create_date = max(create_date),
		first_name = max(first_name),
		last_name = max(last_name),
		FullName = max(FullName),
		login_id = max(login_id),
		email = max(email),
		bamboo_id = max(bamboo_id),
		practice = max(practice),
		current_manager = max(current_manager),
		joblevel_rate = max(joblevel_rate),
		mobile_phone = max(mobile_phone),
		xCustom = max(xCustom)) ~> AggrUserData
AggrUserData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		LFBI_ID as integer,
		LFBI_LoadTime as timestamp,
		LFBI_Start as timestamp,
		LFBI_End as timestamp,
		LFBI_Current as boolean,
		billable as boolean,
		active as boolean,
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		bamboo_id as integer,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		joblevel_rate as decimal(19,4),
		Mobile_Phone as string,
		OnPTO as boolean,
		xCustom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Mobile_Phone'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		LFBI_LoadTime = create_date,
		LFBI_Current = create_date,
		LFBI_Start = create_date,
		LFBI_End = create_date,
		billable,
		active,
		create_date,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		joblevel_rate,
		Mobile_Phone = mobile_phone,
		xCustom
	)) ~> dPersonnel

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcTraffic
srcTraffic sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtTraffic

source(output(
		timeperiod as string,
		flow1 as integer,
		occupancy1 as double,
		speed1 as double,
		flow2 as integer,
		occupancy2 as double,
		speed2 as double,
		flow3 as integer,
		occupancy3 as double,
		speed3 as double,
		flow4 as integer,
		occupancy4 as double,
		speed4 as double,
		flow5 as integer,
		occupancy5 as double,
		speed5 as double,
		flow6 as integer,
		occupancy6 as double,
		speed6 as double,
		flow7 as integer,
		occupancy7 as double,
		speed7 as double,
		flow8 as integer,
		occupancy8 as double,
		speed8 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> traffic
traffic sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		timeperiod,
		flow1,
		occupancy1,
		speed1,
		flow2,
		occupancy2,
		speed2,
		flow3,
		occupancy3,
		speed3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserDataSink

source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'parquet') ~> UserData
UserData derive(registrationDT = toDate(toString(registration_dttm))) ~> RegistrationDT
RegistrationDT sink(input(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		registration_dttm = registrationDT,
		id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		email,
		gender,
		ip_address,
		cc,
		country,
		birthdate,
		salary,
		title,
		comments
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserDataSink

source(output(
		timeperiod as string,
		flow1 as integer,
		occupancy1 as double,
		speed1 as double,
		flow2 as integer,
		occupancy2 as double,
		speed2 as double,
		flow3 as integer,
		occupancy3 as double,
		speed3 as double,
		flow4 as integer,
		occupancy4 as double,
		speed4 as double,
		flow5 as integer,
		occupancy5 as double,
		speed5 as double,
		flow6 as integer,
		occupancy6 as double,
		speed6 as double,
		flow7 as integer,
		occupancy7 as double,
		speed7 as double,
		flow8 as integer,
		occupancy8 as double,
		speed8 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		timeperiod,
		flow1,
		occupancy1,
		speed1,
		flow2,
		occupancy2,
		speed2,
		flow3,
		occupancy3,
		speed3,
		flow4,
		occupancy4,
		speed4,
		flow5,
		occupancy5,
		speed5,
		flow6,
		occupancy6,
		speed6,
		flow7,
		occupancy7,
		speed7,
		flow8,
		occupancy8,
		speed8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
getdate() as [LFBI_LoadTime],
getdate() as [LFBI_Start],
getdate() as [LFBI_End],
1 as [LFBI_Current],
Date_OF_Birth as create_date, 
[User_Name] as [user_id], 
[First_Name] as first_name, 
[LastName] as last_name, 
[First_Name] + ',' + [LastName] as FullName, 
[User_Name] as login_id, 
[EMail] as email, 
1 as active, 
getdate() as update_date, 
1 as billable, 
0 as mscrm_system_user_id, 
0 as mscrm_cat_consultant_id, 
0 as mscrm_contact_id, 
165 as contractor_rate, 
1 as contractor_rate_type, 
1234 as user_guid, 
Weight_in_Kgs as bamboo_id, 
'Data' as practice, 
1 as current_manager, 
'0' as xCustom,
3 as joblevel_rate, 
Phone_No as mobile_phone,
'0' as [OnPTO]
from dbo.dboEmpSample
